sys_ui_macro.description: This is used to show instructions on the datacards form until we create the simplified form.
sys_ui_macro.name: Datacard_Form_Instructions
sys_ui_macro.xml:
Creating or Editing a Datacard:

  • You must have at least read access to the table you select in the field below.
  • You must have at least read access to any field you use in the Query Condition builder below.
  • If you do not have access to one of the above, you will see an infinitly-loading datacard.
  • The Order field is used to determine the order the datacards will appear on your homepage.
  • The list type field can be used to determine whether or not you want to see a Visual Task Board or a standard list when you click on the card.
  • If you select the Visual Task Board list type, you must choose a field to use for your lanes. If you choose a field that you do not have read access to or a field that is not logical for a Visual Task Board, it will break and create incorrect task boards for you.
  • For more information about datacards please$[SP]click here.
